Travels Europe 2012 The Fäboden, Trönö, Sweden

The Fäboden, Trönö, Sweden

For the first week in Sweden we stayed in a tent at Evalena's family fäboden (summer house) by the lake. It was a magical view and a relaxing time

  • The view from our tent on the first morning
  • Our home for a week
  • The jetty that we jumped off each day to go have a wash/swim
  • Taking Freja for a walk through the forrest to get her to sleep.
  • The country house
  • A disused train line behind the lake and through the forrest. Fun to take a walk down.
  • Looking out of our tent as night comes in.
